body: Thanks @wujingyue. I think we can leave `use_calibration` be true by default and `LOG(ERROR)` the invalid combination in `create_inference_graph()` for now. I believe in TF 2.0 there will be breaking changes, and I think we can put all the breaking changes together to reduce confusions.
body_html: Thanks @wujingyue. I think we can leave use_calibration be true by default and LOG(ERROR) the invalid combination in create_inference_graph() for now. I believe in TF 2.0 there will be breaking changes, and I think we can put all the breaking changes together to reduce confusions.
